name: Dinari CAT
description: The Dinari CAT dShares token (CAT.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Caterpillar Inc. (CAT), a global leader in construction and mining equipment, energy solutions, and industrial manufacturing. Each CAT.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding Caterpillar share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. Leveraging blockchain technology, CAT.d enables fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, providing investors with an innovative and modern way to access Caterpillarâ€™s equity.
